text: Di hui deenei la gaa hai beenei, idimaa goodou gu daudali nia haihai huaidu o di king Omri mo nia hai o dana dama daane go King Ahab. Goodou gu hai hegau hua beelaa i nadau haganoho, gei Au gaa hai goodou gi huaidu, gei nia daangada i nia gowaa huogodoo ga haga balumee goodou.”6.16 1 Kings 16.23-34; 21.25-26
